text: Have you been here all night?
Look at this.

Pictures of all the women
that Heckles went out with.
Look what he wrote on them.
"Vivian, too tall."
"Madge, big gums."

"Too loud."
"Too smart."

"Makes noise
when she eats."
This is, this is me.
This is what I do.

I'm gonna end up alone
just like he did.

Chandler, Heckles
was a nut case.

Our trains are on
the same track, okay?

Yeah, sure, I'm coming up
30 years behind him
but the stops are all the same.
Bittertown, Aloneville
Hermit Junction.

Alright, you know,
what we got to do?
We got to get you out of here.

Come on, I'll buy
you breakfast. Let's go.

Well, what if I never
find somebody?

Or even worse,
what if I already found her

but I dumped her because
she pronounces it supposebly?

Chandler, come on.
You're gonna find somebody.
How do you know that?

- How?
- I don't know.

I'm just trying
to help you out.

You'll see, you guys are all
gonna go off and get married
and I'm gonna end up alone.

(Chandler)
'Will you promise
me something?'

When you're married, will you
invite me over for holidays?

Well, I mean, I don't know
what we're gonna be doin'.

I mean, uh, what if we're over
at her folks' place?
Yeah, I understand.

You can come over
and watch the Super Bowl.
Every year. Alright?
You know what?

I'm not gonna
end up like this.
I'll see you, man.
[instrumental music]
[telephone ringing]
Hi. It's me.
Oh, my God.
